website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-H10 is a decent budget megazoom that can deliver very nice outdoor shots, but its photo quality falls short in other respects.
pros: Capable of excellent photos outdoors in good light

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have another Sony Cybershot and it took fantastic pictures. We were in Alaska and somehow I lost the battery cover. Sony couldn’t replace that part so I put the camera in the drawer until my husband found this one. It too takes fantastic pictures and the price was very reasonable. Camera was delivered on time and like I said, it takes fantastic photos.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mercer

customer_reviews.title: It has never disappointed me in performance or picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera many years ago as a camera that I snapped pics with when I didn't want to use my full sized SLR. It has never disappointed me in performance or picture quality. I frequently blow my pics up to 8x10 & they look great. I'm pretty hard to please when it comes to my pics. I've never had any problems with it in my many years of use. My one & only complaint is that you can't zoom in once you've started shooting video, so get in as close as you want before you start filming.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this camera!
customer_reviews.text: And so my father bought one too. Perfect little pocket camera with a nice zoom. I personally go with a bigger prosumer model (Lumix GF-1), but alternatively this would make a good complement to a DSLR. Battery is on the small side, so if you are going on safari without power for a few days, either buy an extra battery or get a small car charger (Duracell makes a good one in the 100w range for $70) and bring your charger with. Another downside is that it uses Sony 'Memory Stick Duo' media, not SD card, so not compatible with my other cameras/GPS/laptop/UPS adapters. Wife has another Sony, so fine for her I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rollins, PE

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: This camera appears to be a good value purchase. I like the "Steady Shot" and "face recognition" features. Having the ability to take multiple pictures in rapid succession is also a handy feature. The 10x zoom is great. It would be nice if it also came with an "optional" small hand strap, in addition to, the larger neck strap that comes included with the camera. The lens cap is not an issue, as the camera displays that you have failed to remove the cap when it is inadvertently left on. Overall, the camera, considering its features and quality of digital photographs, is a good value for the money invested.
customer_reviews.author: mlbrad

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, easy to use, great pictures
customer_reviews.text: We love the camera, and have used it for 6 years with zero problems. 2 items kept us from giving it a 5-star rating: the location of the rocker button that controls the zoom is in a place that often results in the rocker being bumped by my right thumb when I position my hand and index finger to press the shutter release button. The other issue is that this camera has no provision for a "remote" shutter release, neither electronic or mechanical - this is not a problem for most people, but if you think you might ever have a need for that option be aware that this camera will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is an older model of camera, however, I have had one for YEARS and have literally taken 10's of 1000's of pictures with it. I LOVE this camera! I have basically worn out the one I had. I was so excited to find this on Amazon and will get more of the same model if I can find it.
customer_reviews.author: nancy shaver

customer_reviews.title: i am happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: the camera is quite compact. what i like most about it is that my attachments from my older camera fits this camera also. i also like the fact that you can take decent photos without the flash. there is only two things that are minor which i don't particularly care for. one is there is not a separate view finder where you can save on battery life. another is which i knew about before was you have to have lens cover off to engage the camera. other than that i am really happy with my purchase. i got my camera in a timely manner and it works great. thank you
customer_reviews.author: B. Russell

customer_reviews.title: My thanks to the seller..Great camera! Great service.!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase.! I thought I had already sent a glowing review but will gladly do so again.! The camera arrived in 2 days..It was in its original box and included a memory stick, battery, charger, straps,etc AND instruction book.! I had it checked at a local camera store..It's in perfect working order.! My pics are great and I am enjoying this wonderful camera..It replaces same camera I lost years ago..so it's like finding an old friend.! KUDOS to the seller.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera -  a few flaws
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt this camera takes nice pictures and it lives up to it's name Steady Shot. However, there are two flaws. The Zoom button is in such a place that you find yourself zooming when you don't mean to. Your thumb ends up on the zoom if you hold the camera by the "handle". Secondly, I just took the camera on vacation and I found that the battery died fairly quickly - much quicker than my last camera. I was charging the camera every evening, but still the charge did not last throughout a whole day. So, I just ordered an extra battery, which was about $30.
customer_reviews.author: A. McDermott

customer_reviews.title: very nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved it today before the delivery date and I was happy about how early it came. I just got it today and i absolutly love everything this camera has to offer! Everything about this camera is amazing the images are wow!! And recoding is amazing! Anybody who is looking for a new camera I definitely recommend this!! You won't be dissappointed!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Camera For All Skill Levels
customer_reviews.text: Here is a digital camera that accommodates all photographic skill levels. Even a photographically challenged dummy like me can take wonderful pictures. And the more I learn about the camera, the more things I can do. I won't list here all the attributes because you can see those elsewhere, but I will say that EVERYONE can take great pictures with this camera! And if you are interested in photography, you can go a long way with this camera. In fact, you may never outgrow it.
customer_reviews.author: Claja 99

customer_reviews.title: My favorite little camera
customer_reviews.text: Good camera, good lens, had it's limits but still my favorite for toting, it's small, good snap shots and amateur.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge R

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot DSC-H10
customer_reviews.text: This was my third Sony digital camera. When I used a print SLR, I had a Nikon N90; the best...! For the price, you can't beat these Sony's. Many of my friends and my own daughter has the Cannon's. But honestly, I do prefer the Sony for overall results. If I had to find a complaint, it would have to be the fact that the Sony has a manual lens cap, where Cannon is automatic.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lenahan

customer_reviews.title: The Sony Cyber Shot camera condition was just as the seller described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera to replace the one I've used for a number of years. I am in the process of using a slide adapter to convert my 35 mm slides to a digital disk.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this thing for a decade now no problems.
customer_reviews.author: maskedman72

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with SONY!
customer_reviews.text: This is my ninth SONY digital camera, beginning with my first Mavica (that used floppy disks as the storage). I will never use another brand of camera. I still use a large, pro-quality SONY and this is for my purse/pocket. I love the camera and all of the modes to shoot in. The display is big, clear and practically tells you HOW to shoot and when!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrill A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So my sister had this camera and it took such beautiful pictures that I knew I had to have it. Luckily for me it is about a 4 year old camera so I did not have to pay the original price of 400.00 and I got it for 140.00. SCORE! The picture quality is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Candice La Mar

customer_reviews.title: Sony Cybershot
customer_reviews.text: This camera is very good for the price. I'm still trying to figure out all of the features. I've had some blurry pictures, but those are usually when I'm taking pictures in dark conditions. The zoom is wonderful and pictures are clear.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth D.

customer_reviews.title: General Pics Person
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my sister-in-law who is not a pro picture taker....it takes the thinking out of taking pics. Very easy to use with great results. Nice, bright 3" screen on the back of the camera. Battery life seems to be very good. Great overall camera.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Best camera ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best camera we have ever owned! Super sharp and remarkable zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Bartholomew Cubbins

customer_reviews.title: Really good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This camera is really good. Have been using it for last 5 years without any problems. A great value for the money paid.
customer_reviews.author: Akshat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS CAMERA!  A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My friend had this camera and we used it many a times for photographing our jewelry for our website, and I needed a new camera myself so I purchased this and it was the best Idea Ive had this year! well worth the hundred dollars I spent.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Cybershot DSC-H10
customer_reviews.text: Camera was everything I asked for and was delivered as promised except that the vendor shipped a product received from Sony that was destined for UK so the power cord from and to the charger had to be swapped out for an American plug and not a UK plug. $2.50 at Fry's not a big deal just confirm with vendor that they should ship an American plug if the UK unit is shipped. Great camera though size and zoom is what I asked for. and good value on a discontinued camera.
customer_reviews.author: milo

customer_reviews.title: Great for just taking pictures for fun
customer_reviews.text: Needed a camera to take family pictures and sports pictures. Very nice clear pictures, rechargable battery is definately a plus, don't really like the lens attachment- but it works great without it. Great purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha M. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with camera
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with the Sony Cybershot. The zoom is very good especially for a point and shoot. The organizing folders in the camera are also very handy particularly when you cant get to a computer to upload the photos right away. We would recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Misty D.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great light weight camera
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he is thrilled with the camera. We both have digital SLR's and he uses this as his hiking, biking camera. Great shots, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Sony electronics
customer_reviews.text: Own a Sony Cybershot for a few years, decided to upgrade to get more zoom and larger view screen. Very simple to use and takes great shots- would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dale I. T

customer_reviews.title: Sweet zoom!
customer_reviews.text: This camera has enabled me to take equally great photos at my kids' Little League games and when out seeing bands - and so much more. The videos are awesome. All-around easy to use point-and-shoot with excellent zoom ability. A good option before the SLR-like model step.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Savage

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Camera for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera for the price we have paid. The features are pretty self exclamatory. I take a lot of photos for my business and the only flaw is when picking up the camera (when it is still on) it is easy to accedently hit other buttons on the display mantel. It is real easy to use. Love the big display pictures. I would reccomend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Bailey

customer_reviews.title: cybershot
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product, does all I want it to do, have a high end camera but want one for knockin' around, this is it
customer_reviews.author: Karl Breckenridge

customer_reviews.title: I  would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: it is a great camera but would be better if it had a standard size sd card
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, horrible seller... Ashamed to say I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great... I can't express enough how disappointed I am with this purchase. The camera is spectacular and works awesomely. The box it came in, (original box) was not in the best shape, it was "opened" and missing parts. I am thinking of either returning it and asking the seller to send a new one or send me the cords which were suppose to have come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Nesbitt in Alaska!!

customer_reviews.title: sony camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is fantastic, it does everything it says & beautifully. The photos are georgous and the camera is VERY user friendly. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Azarigian

customer_reviews.title: Vacation documented with easy.
customer_reviews.text: The Sony Cyber-shot Model DSC-H10 camera was bought four weeks before leaving on our 3500+ mile driving trip thru 12 states. Great pictures with quick recovery for next shot. I did purchase a spare battery for backup which was a quick recovery when notified of low battery power.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. White

customer_reviews.title: It didn't do it immediately and I'm pretty careful with camera equipment
customer_reviews.text: The camera malfunctions now by imparting a purple haze to each shot...disappointing...It didn't do it immediately and I'm pretty careful with camera equipment...unfortunate
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beck

customer_reviews.title: Camera Review
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just like it came off the shelf in the store. After having bought a camera case and shoulder straps for the camera, I couldn't be any happier.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Raabe

customer_reviews.title: Cyber shot
customer_reviews.text: Just a great product overall. I lost my first one I bought a few years ago, and found this one through Amazon. I was so happy to get another one!
customer_reviews.author: Stickman

customer_reviews.title: Any modern smart phone takes better pictures
customer_reviews.text: I think this was a little overpriced. Any modern smart phone takes better pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter so I have not used this camera. She is very happy with the performance and the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dale Zirkle II

customer_reviews.title: nice digital image machine
customer_reviews.text: I am a Ludite when it comes to these new digital cameras. I really miss photographic paper and the chemicals, but you can't work with this stuff and kids so, I got this camera thing and it has O.K. images but not photographs. Never confuse digital imagery with photography, it really is a different thing. This one has a rechargeable battery and, if you get one of these cameras get a second battery. It has a really nice image screen and the buttons are fairly user friendly. It is O.K., but it ain't photography.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph N. Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Sony Cybershot DSC-H10 8.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot
product_meta.description: Sony Cybershot DSC-H10 8.1MP Digital Camera with 10x Optical Zoom with Super Steady Shot
feature_bullets: 8.1-megapixel Super HAD CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
Carl Zeiss 10x optical zoom lens; Smart Zoom feature
3.0-inch large Clear Photo LCD Plus display; Face Detection
Sony Double Anti-Blur Solution; in-camera retouching
31 MB internal memory; capture images to Memory Stick Duo/Pro Duo media

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars115 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
